name: Escape From Police (itch) (MESYA)
description:
Escape from Police is an endless runner game developed on the UE5.1 engine using C++. In this game, you need to try to escape from the chasing police while collecting coins and dodging obstacles and oncoming traffic. How far can you go?

Key features:
  • Endless
  • Distance
  • Coins
Controls:
  • A D, Arrows or D-Pad to move
